DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the feasibility of performing repetitive coronary angiograms via the radial approach
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility and Outcomes of Repetitive Radial Approach
DOC.detailed_description: Assessing succes of radial access in patients with prior TRA procedures
DOC.criteria: Patients with previous successful radial artery approach scheduled for elective transradial coronary angiography Lack of indication to perform radial approach Abnormal Barbeau test result (type C and D) Presence of radial artery occlusion Previous important trauma of the upper limbs Presence of fistula for renal dialysis Lymphoedema Acute myocardial infarction Refusal to sign the informed consent form
